meta.description: Comprehensive RippleUI component library specification for Moonlanding based on existing UI/UX patterns

framework.name: RippleUI
framework.approach: Utility-first CSS framework with custom components
framework.philosophy: Mobile-first responsive design with accessible, performant components

fontFamily.sans: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif
fontFamily.mono: 'SF Mono', Monaco, 'Cascadia Code', 'Roboto Mono', Consolas, monospace

button.description: Action buttons with multiple variants and sizes

card.description: Container for grouped content with shadow and border radius

form.description: Form inputs, labels, and validation patterns

modal.description: Modal dialog overlays for focused interactions

enter.panel: scale(0.95) to scale(1) + fade in 0.2s ease

exit.panel: scale(1) to scale(0.95) + fade out 0.15s ease

animation.enter: slide in from right (translateX(100%) to 0) 0.3s ease-out

table.description: Data tables with responsive mobile card view

menuToggle.display: block on mobile, hidden on desktop

navLinks.display: hidden on mobile, flex on desktop

dashboard.description: Dashboard layout with stat cards and sections
sections: Stat cards (4 columns on desktop, 1 on mobile)

keyboardNavigation.focusIndicators: Visible focus rings on all focusable elements
keyboardNavigation.arrowKeys: Navigate through dropdown items and tabs

ariaSupport.selected: aria-selected on tabs and active items

screenReader.altText: Descriptive alt text on all images

colorContrast.standard: WCAG AA minimum (4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text)
colorContrast.buttons: High contrast between text and background
colorContrast.links: Distinguishable by color and underline on hover

sources.svg: Custom inline SVG icons for UI controls
sources.emoji: Unicode emoji for decorative elements and empty states
sources.library: Optional: Heroicons, Lucide, or similar icon sets

iconSystem.sizing: Font-size based (inherit from parent or explicit size class)

examples.navigation: SVG icons for menu, close, chevrons, arrows
examples.actions: SVG or text for edit, delete, view, download
examples.status: Emoji or SVG for empty states, info bubbles

printStyles.recommendation: Add @media print styles for reports and reviews

performanceOptimizations.lazyLoading: Not currently implemented - recommended for images and large lists

caching.moduleCache: Server-side module caching with hot reload

performanceOptimizations.debouncing: Live search filters as user types (no explicit debounce)

patterns.formState: Managed via standard form elements and fetch API
patterns.uiState: Local component state via WebJSX hooks
patterns.globalState: Minimal - user session and auth only

validation.clientSide: HTML5 required attribute and browser validation

accessDenied.message: You do not have permission to {action} in {entity}

pdfCoordinates.CRITICAL: Must preserve exact x, y coordinates from source systems
pdfCoordinates.note: Zoom/rotation breaks positioning - no recalculation allowed

userDeduplication.overlap: 10-15% of users exist in both Friday and MWR
userDeduplication.mapping: Create user_id_mapping table for FK tracking

enumOptionsDynamic.pattern: Enum fields with dynamic options from config
enumOptionsDynamic.resolution: Must resolve at render time from master-config.yml

implementationNotes.cssFramework: RippleUI v1.12.1 with Tailwind-like utility classes
implementationNotes.buildSystem: Zero-build runtime using tsx for TypeScript/JSX transpilation
implementationNotes.moduleSystem: ES modules with @/ alias for src/
implementationNotes.stylingApproach: Utility-first with custom CSS in src/ui/styles.css
implementationNotes.componentCount: ~493 CSS classes covering all major UI patterns

usageGuidelines.componentSelection: Use appropriate variant for context (primary buttons for main actions, ghost for navigation)
usageGuidelines.colorUsage: Maintain consistent color semantics (success=green, danger=red, warning=yellow, info=blue)
usageGuidelines.typographyHierarchy: Follow established heading hierarchy (h1 for page titles, h2 for sections)
usageGuidelines.accessibilityFirst: Always include ARIA labels, focus states, and keyboard navigation
usageGuidelines.mobileFirst: Design for mobile first, enhance for larger screens
usageGuidelines.performanceAware: Keep components lightweight, avoid heavy animations on low-end devices

futureEnhancements.darkMode: Add dark theme support with CSS variables
futureEnhancements.componentLibrary: Extract to standalone npm package for reuse
futureEnhancements.designTokens: Export design tokens for Figma/Sketch integration
